name: Power Probe 3000 Circuit Tracer for Shorts and Opens
short_description: Quickly Locate Shorts and Opens: Trace wiring shorts, open circuits, and battery drains without removing panels, molding, or carpets.
Intelligent Transmitter and Receiver: Features advanced technology for precise circuit diagnostics, including direction indicators for grounded and open signals.
Versatile Application: Perfect for locating intermittent conditions, testing continuity, and isolating circuits in automotive electrical systems.
Complete Kit Included: Comes with alligator clip, blade probe, piercing probe, back probe adapter, universal adapter, and a sturdy blow-molded case.
Durable and Safe Design: Operates within 6-48 VDC and built with robust safety standards, ideal for professional automotive technicians.
product_description: The new Power Probe ECT3000 electrical short and open Finder makes locating short and open circuits quickly and more accurately than ever before. When the ECT3000 transmitter is connected to an isolated circuit, it will quickly determine if the circuit has an open or if the circuit is shorted to ground. The ECT3000 receiver is designed to detect the signal emitted from the transmitter notifying you open 8 inches of adjustable height sensitivity allows.

name: MESTEK Circuit Breaker Finder, Electrical Circuit Tracer Tool Kit with Integrated GFCI Outlet Tester, Works on AC 90-135V, Circuit Tester with Buzzer Alarm & Color LCD Display, Includes Carrying Case
short_description: ACCURATE CIRCUIT BREAKER IDENTIFICATION - The MESTEK CBF01 circuit breaker finder can quickly and accurately locate the correct breaker on electrical systems. The breaker detector finder is compatible with standard 90-135V AC 50/60Hz breaker systems, making it suitable for a variety of electrical systems and installations. It is a great electrician tool for troubleshooting electrical issues in houses, offices, factories, power network reconstruction, etc.

EASILY TWO-PART SYSTEM - The unit is a signal injection type digital circuit breaker finder, consists of a Transmitter connected to the outlet or fixture and a Receiver to scan the panel. Just locate the correct breaker in 3 steps, no need to adjust the sensitivity manually, allowing for easy and accurate breaker identification.

VISUAL & AUDIBLE INDICATIONS - The Transmitter (outlet tester) designed with a large VA reverse display color screen and bright LED lights illuminate green and red for easy visual indication. The Receiver designed with analog bar display, visual indicators and audible alert, ensuring a hassle-free locating process. The CBF01 circuit tester is more intuitive than old version in the market, can better distinguish the data at a glance.

BUILT-IN GFCI TESTER - The Transmitter also can be a gfci outlet tester individually, it can test GFCI trip time in seconds to find out if the trip breaker is functioning, enabling to detect 6 common wiring conditions and test GFCI devices for enhanced safety. And the auto-hold function is convenient for hard-to-reach outlets to lock the data.

USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN - The Transmitter can dock in the Receiver to keep components together, or put them into the included storage bag when not in use. Both transmitter and receiver also support Auto Shut-off, Low battery Indication. And designed with double injection precision case, anti-dust, anti-skip, and anti-drop triple protection, making the device wear-resistant and easy to hold. All these convenient features make testing work much easier and safer.

WHAT YOU GET - 1×Transmitter(GFCI outlet tester), 1×Receiver, 2×AAA Batteries for transmitter, 2×AA Batteries for receiver, 1×Storage Bag, 1×User Manual. We also provide a 24-month manufacturer warranty and lifetime customer support to ensure your satisfaction. With the thoughtful After-sale, you can use this circuit breaker finder with confidence and peace of mind.

name: Klein Tools RT390 Circuit Analyzer with Large LCD, Identifies Wiring Faults, GFCI and AFCI Tester, Voltage Drop, Displays Trip Time
short_description: CLEAR COLOR LCD DISPLAY: Circuit Analyzer with large color LCD provides easy-to-understand results for wiring faults, AFCI, GFCI, voltage drops, and device trip time
COMPREHENSIVE WIRING FAULT DETECTION: Detect and identify common wiring faults in standard, AFCI, and GFCI electrical outlets, ensuring thorough evaluation
DUAL WIRING FAULT DETECTION: Capable of detecting dual wiring faults, including open neutral and open ground, enhancing safety measures
AFCI AND GFCI DEVICE INSPECTION: Inspect AFCI and GFCI devices, measuring trip time and trip current for accurate functionality assessment
LOAD TESTING CAPABILITIES: Conduct 12A, 15A, and 20A load testing to measure percentage voltage drops, providing valuable insights into electrical performance
AUTO POWER OFF: Automatically powers off after 5 minutes of inactivity, conserving battery life and ensuring long-term usage
DETACHABLE CORD: Detachable cord allows for easy storage, providing convenience and organized handling of the Circuit Analyzer
product_description: The Klein Tools RT390 is a Circuit Analyzer that tests the wiring conditions at an electrical outlet, displays AC line voltage, inspects AFCI and GFCI devices with time to trip device, and performs voltage drop tests at 12A, 15A and 20A current loads. Results are easy to understand with large, color LCD. The tester is designed for use with North American 120V AC 3-wire electrical outlets. name: Fluke BK120 SmartTrace Breaker Finder and Socket Tester
short_description: A 4-in-1 tool that acts as a breaker finder, NCV detector, socket tester, and bright LED flashlight.
Audible and visual alerts take the guesswork out of locating a circuit breaker.
Unique dual-sensitivity NCV mode for non-contact voltage detection on terminal strips and supply cords.
Transmitter has a built-in socket tester with easy-to-see LEDs to verify correct wiring in both standard and GFCI outlets.
product_description: The Fluke BK120 SmartTrace Breaker Finder is a tool for identifying circuit breakers in electrical panels and detecting voltage with the NCV mode. It is an essential device for electricians, homeowners, and maintenance professionals, to simplify electrical work, circuit tracing, and troubleshooting. The product includes a receiver that acts as the Breaker Finder and non-contact voltage detector, and a transmitter that traces to the receiver and also acts as a socket tester.

name: Klein Tools ET310TRANS ET310 Circuit Breaker Finder Replacement Transmitter, Digital Circuit Breaker Finder, Integrated GFCI Outlet Tester
short_description: REPLACEMENT TRANSMITTER for the ET310 Circuit Breaker Finder with Integrated GFCI Outlet Tester
THE ET310 HAS TWO PARTS a Transmitter connected to the electrical outlet or fixture, and a Receiver used to scan the panel to locate the correct breaker
TEST GFCI DEVICES for tripping with GFCI tester incorporated into the Transmitter
CHECK COMMON WIRING FAULTS in North American grounded electrical outlets
CONNECT THE TRANSMITTER to other electrical fixtures using optional accessories which are sold separately (Cat. No. 69411)
NO BATTERIES NEEDED Transmitter is powered by the circuit when connected to the electrical outlet or fixture
SAFETY RATING of CAT II 120V
product_description: The Klein Tools ET310TRANS is a replacement Transmitter for the ET310 Circuit Breaker Finder. The ET310 consists of two parts; a Transmitter which is connected to the electrical outlet/circuit and the Receiver which is used to scan the breakers in the panel. The Transmitter features an integrated GFCI Outlet Tester to check for wiring faults. name: Klein Tools 80101 Circuit Breaker Finder Kit, GFCI Outlet and Receptacle Tester Kit, Multimeter, NCVT, Outlet Tester, Leads, 6-Piece
short_description: SMART BUY: A complete, high-performance kit that offers convenience and value
CONVENIENT KIT includes three testers with leads for electrical test and measurement applications; Digital Multimeter, Non-Contact Voltage Tester with Flashlight, and GFCI Receptacle Tester
VARIETY OF FEATURES on the Digital Multimeter MM320 measures up to 600V AC/DC voltage, 10A DC current and 2MOhms resistance; also tests batteries, diodes, and continuity
DUAL-RANGE TESTING CAPABILITIES allow Voltage Tester NCVT3P to detect from 12 to 1000 VAC or 70 to 1000 VAC for a broad variety of low-voltage or standard voltage applications

DETECT WIRING CONDITIONS on GFCI Receptacle Tester RT250 which features a large backlit LCD readout of voltage, and clear indication of wiring conditions, with patent pending detection of Open Neutral / Open Ground wiring faults
CIRCUIT BREAKER FINDER quickly and accurately locate the correct circuit breaker in a panel corresponding to the circuit to which an electrical outlet or fixture is connected
GFCI TESTER consists of two parts: a Transmitter connected to the electrical outlet or fixture, and a Receiver used to scan the panel to locate the correct breaker
product_description: 4-Piece Klein Tools Homeowner Tester Kit is the ideal kit to test all your in-home electrical testing needs, featuring GFCI and Non-Contact Voltage Testers. Premium Electrical Test Kit includes a Manual-Ranging Digital Multimeter (Cat. No. MM320) with right-angle test leads, Dual Range Non-Contact Voltage Tester with Flashlight, 12 to 1000 VAC (Cat. No. NCVT3P), and a GFCI Receptacle Tester with LCD (Cat. No. RT250). Circuit Breaker Finder with Integrated GFCI Outlet Tester is a digital circuit breaker finder used to locate the correct circuit breaker in a panel to which an electrical outlet or fixture is connected.

name: Klein Tools 69411 Circuit Breaker Finder Accessory Kit, Circuit Breaker Leads and Adapters
short_description: COMPATIBLE WITH ET300 AND ET310: Designed for use with ET300 and ET310 Digital Circuit Breaker Finder, enhancing functionality
LIGHT SOCKET ADAPTER: Easily find the correct circuit of a lighting fixture using the included light socket adapter
ALLIGATOR CLIP ADAPTER: Enables testing on bare wires, providing versatile usage options
GROUNDING ADAPTER INCLUDED: Includes standard 3-prong to 2-prong grounding adapter for added convenience
EXPAND YOUR TESTING CAPABILITIES: Enhance circuit breaker finding and testing capabilities with these versatile adapters
EFFICIENT CIRCUIT IDENTIFICATION: Quickly identify circuits with the light socket adapter, saving time and effort
VERSATILE USAGE OPTIONS: Alligator clip adapter allows for easy testing on various types of wires and connections
product_description: The Klein Tools circuit breaker kit allows your circuit breaker finder to do more than just indicate standard circuits. Adapters in this kit indicate the correct breaker of bare wires or other exposed conductors. Adapters also indicate the correct breaker for light fixtures. name: Blue Sea Systems 285-Series Circuit Breaker - Surface Mount / 60A
short_description: Drop in replacement for 185-Series Circuit Breakers
Visible reset lever shows open condition
Ignition protected - Safe for installation aboard gasoline powered boats
Meets SAE J1171 external ignition protection requirements
Combines switching and circuit breaker function into one unit
product_description: Circuit protection and switch combined in a single medium duty breaker. Ideal for windlass and electric winch applications, these surface mounted medium duty circuit breakers function as a switch, but also provide tailored circuit protection. A visible lever shows when the breaker has tripped and cannot be held in the ON position if a fault is detected. Ignition protected and water resistant, they can be installed almost anywhere; including the engine room of gasoline powered boats. Connected terminal caps protect terminals from accidental contact and help to prevent cross current shorts. Terminal studs are located on the face of the circuit breaker for easy installation.

name: Circuit Breaker Finder, Non-Contact Voltage Tester Outlet / Receptacle Tester Kit Sensitivity Adjustable Professional Circuit Finder for Home
short_description: [EFFORTLESS IDENTIFICATION]: The Circuit Testers Can Quickly and easily identify correct circuit breaker or fuse, protecting a specific electrical circuit. Features visual flashing light and an audible beeping to alert you when the correct breaker is identified.
[CIRCUIT TESTER KITS]: Tester consists of two parts; a Transmitter, connected to the electrical outlet or fixture; a Receiver, used to scan the panel to locate the correct breaker
[OPERABLE]: Sensitivity can be adjusted through the ON/OFF switch. The operator can determine the status of circuit connection according to the 3 LEDs.
[ELECTRICAL DETECTOR]: Receiver: UT25A / B; Operating Voltage: 90-120V; Operating Frequency: 50-60Hz; Transmitter Working Voltage: 110-125V;Operating Frequency: 50-60Hz
[HOME ESSENTIALS]: This circuit tester is an indispensable equipment for your circuit test, Professional tool for house, office, factory power network reconstruction, etc.
product_description: description of goods: By using a transmitter and receiver, this circuit breaker finder quickly and easily identifies individual branch circuits at the panel box without interrupting power. It is the best way to accurately locate circuit breakers. They are compact in size and extremely easy to use. Features: Quickly and easily identify correct circuit breaker or fuse, protecting a specific electrical circuit. Sensitivity can be adjusted through the ON/OFF switch. The operator can determine the status of circuit connection according to the 3 LEDs. Features visual flashing light and an audible beeping to alert you when the correct breaker is identified. It is convenient to test out whether the socket/plug is safe. Professional tool for house, office, factory power network reconstruction, etc. Specification: Receiver Type UT25A / B Operating Voltage 90-120V Operating Frequency 50-60Hz Power Supply 1 x 9V Battery(Not Included) Operating Temperature 5℃-40℃ Storage Temperature -20℃-60℃ Transmitter Working Voltage 110-125V Operating Frequency 50-60Hz Fuse 1A, 250V, 4x11mm(dia) Receiver Size(appr.) 19 x 5 x 3cm / 7.5 x 2.0 x 1.2 Package Weight(appr.) 262g Package Included: 1 x Circuit Breaker Finder (Receiver) 1 x Socket Tester (Transmitter) 1 x User Manual
